juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Cast iron skillet with tomahawk steak and potato wedges
*   Rosemary sprigs
*   Wooden cutting board with large rustic knife
*   Two small bowls of mustard/sauces
*   Glass of dark beverage
*   Wooden bowl of coarse salt
*   Small bowl of whole spices
*   Plate with taco/flatbread and toppings
*   Existing lime slices and cilantro sprigs
*   Small bowl of pickled red onions
*   Bowl of radicchio salad
*   Black plate with sliced T-bone steak
*   Original light-colored, unfolded napkin (under T-bone plate)
*   Original fork and knife set (beside T-bone plate)
*   Original small bowl of ground pepper (beside T-bone plate)
*   Rustic wooden table surface
*   Folded white napkin near the lime slices
*   Steak knife on top of the folded white napkin
